fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Comprehensive package of reforms to EU Banking Rules, comprising of proposed amendments to the Capital Requirements Regulation (“CRR”), the Capital Requirements Directive (“CRD”) and the Bank Recovery and Resolution Directive (“BRRD”), which was published by the European Commission (the “Commission”) on November 23, 2016.

goals__remit: SMBC would like to explain our concerns about the proposal on the intermediate parent undertaking (“IPU”) which will be a significant issue for Japanese banks.
